education_text.0: I may remark that the curious transformations many formulae can undergo, the unsuspected and to a beginner apparently impossible identity of forms exceedingly dissimilar at first sight, is I think one of the chief difficulties in the early part of mathematical studiesIn 1840, Babbage was invited to give a seminar at the      University of Turin University of Turin about his Analytical EngineIn his book, Idea Makers,      Stephen Wolfram Stephen Wolfram defends Lovelace's contributionsThe Engineering in Computer Science and Telecommunications College building in      redirect    Zaragoza University Zaragoza University is called the Ada Byron Building
